index.banner_sub_title: Anywhere you want to go, we have the best experiences waiting for you.
index.search_for_place: Search for a place or activity
index.why_choose_1_text: Experience the destination's true character through genuine encounters and traditional activities
index.why_choose_2_text: Deeply knowledgeable, offering tailored experiences that highlight the region's best through genuine local insights
index.why_choose_3_text: Relax and explore with peace of mind.  We offer 24/7 support and local assistance throughout your trip
index.why_choose_4_text: You‘ll receive a full refund if you cancel at least 24 hours in advance of most experiences.

tour.meeting_pickup_sub: You can head directly to your preferred meeting point.
tour.excellent_trustpilot_text: With more than 160,527 traveler reviews, you can get the full picture before you go.
tour.memorable_experiences_text: you can get the full picture before you go.
tour.global_support_text: Get help anytime, anywhere during your trip with our 24/7 support and local assistance
tour.login_or_signup_sub: for a faster checkout and unlock exclusive deals
tour.contact_rule: Get emails with special offers, inspiration, tips, andother updates from Kapanda. You can unsubscribe at any time.
tour.hosted: This experience is hosted by a
tour.picked_up: I’d like to be picked up
tour.pickup_both: You can make your own way to the meeting point or request pickup. If you're not sure, you can decide later.
tour.pickup_offer: Tell us where you’d like to be picked up from. If you're not sure, you can decide later.
tour.payment_text1: You will be charged the total amount once your order is confirmed.
tour.payment_text2: If confirmation isn't received instantly, an authorization for the total amount will be held until your booking is confirmed.
tour.payment_text3: This experience requires good weather. If it's canceled due to poor weather, you’ll be offered a different date or a full refund.
tour.payment_text4: By clicking 'Book Now', you are acknowledging that you have read and are bound by Kapanda's Customer Terms of Use, Privacy Policy, plus the tour operator's rules & regulations (see the listing for more details).
tour.payment_text5: Kapanda, Inc. facilitates your booking, but a third party tour operator provides the tour/activity directly to you. Kapanda, Inc. does not provide tours or activities itself. By clicking 'Book Now', you agree that you will be sent special offers, inspiration, tips and other updates from Kapanda from which you can unsubscribe at any time.
tour.sort_order_text1: kapanda wants to make your searches as relevant as possible. That’s why we offer many ways to help you find the right experiences for you.
tour.sort_order_text2: On some pages, you can select how to sort the results we display and also use filter options to see only those search results that meet your chosen preferences. You’ll see explanations of what those sort options mean when you select them.
tour.sort_order_text3: You’ll see some experiences with a “Promoted” badge, which means that the operators of those experiences may have agreed to pay Kapanda more to have their experience highlighted.
tour.sort_order_text4: If you see an Experience Award Winner label, the award is based on average review ratings, share of bookings with a review, and number of bookings through Kapanda over a 12-month period.
tour.sort_order_text5: The importance of any one factor over any other in a sort order varies, and the balance is constantly being reviewed and adjusted. We’re always updating our systems and testing new ways to refine and improve your results to make them as relevant as possible to meet your needs.
tour.pickup_up: I’d like to be picked up
tour.picked_meetingPoint: I’ll make my own way to the meeting point
